website_summaries.verdict: This pastry cutter wheel gives you options for cutting both straight lines and fancy fluted edges.
pros: Makes cutting shapes fast and easy
Double headed, with a-  fluted wheel and flat wheel
Good for lattice designs and puff pastries
Santoprene handle provides comfortable non-slip grip
Works for right- or left-hand use
cons: Straight cuts may require a steady hand or measuring mat

customer_reviews.title: Ide find a more durable set.
customer_reviews.text: Came in broken and is very cheaply made, I really don't recommend. :(
customer_reviews.author: Juan L. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Received defective product. A real disappointment since it was sent directly to a friend as a birthday gift😕
customer_reviews.text: When received only had one wheel one corrigated one was missing. Processed a return
customer_reviews.author: Paula R. Green

customer_reviews.title: Good looking pie
customer_reviews.text: This thing is nice and sharp. It cleans up well. I don't think the wheels will ever freeze up. Even though the fluted side looks to small it is perfect for pies.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Bialk

customer_reviews.title: Great for Fresh Pasta
customer_reviews.text: Works well for hand cutting pasta. Feels a bit cheap but has held together the few times I’ve used it. I’m looking into getting a nice brass version now that I know I like the design.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha K.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: kinda flimsy
customer_reviews.text: its a little flimsy but it does the job for a good price, I dunno if I would 'gift' it but it does what it needs to do I use this for making my ravioli and my pasta shapes. I have also used to cut pie and empanada dough
customer_reviews.author: mallory

customer_reviews.title: Great is you make your own Pasta.
customer_reviews.text: Great little tool to have if you make your own pasta. Much more convenient than the large pizza cutter I had used for years. Don’t know why I waited so long to order one.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Bonnie Serrett

customer_reviews.title: Very study and precise cutting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to elevate my holiday pie crusts - both edges are very sharp and I hope they will make very precise cuts. Also, it appears to be very sturdy - I hope it will last me a long time!
customer_reviews.author: lindamia

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very well made with nice sharp edges (be careful if hand washing and you're replacing a worn out version). Nice ergonomic handle. Terrific price.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy N.

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing.
customer_reviews.text: This a is a great product. I used it for my baking class in college. All the students said that they got it from amazon because it was the best price. Worked very smoothly on different types of doughs.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Carter

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and dishwasher safe for easy cleaning. Used it to cut pie dough strips for weaving a lattice crust and for cutting strips of dough for homemade dumplings
customer_reviews.author: WO Rancher

customer_reviews.title: Pasta Reel
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and fits my hand perfectly. Cuts and crimps with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect to cut lattice straps. Very happy with the quality!
customer_reviews.author: jillmarie

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. This is a quality product and I’m glad I purchased it over some of the more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: MDP

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We use this for ravioli (and... little pizzas....) and throw onto the top rack of the dishwasher for easy cleaning. Easy to hold for smaller and larger hands.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works as designed. Well made and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ladeeda

customer_reviews.title: A Pasta Maker's Dream
customer_reviews.text: Works really well when making homemade pasta. I have already recommended this to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Check

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed with how wobbly this was. I purchased it to make a specific type of cookie, and it does get the job done, but the wheel is very wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: My grandson just started making homemade pasta. He loves this all in one pasta tool
customer_reviews.author: Bill Martin

customer_reviews.title: Fits well in your hand.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little tool. I use this to make my homemade crackers and other snacks. Perfect cuts every time.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price. Also very versatile, use it for pastas or pastries
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Must have pastry tool.
customer_reviews.text: I looked for pne of these for years and ech time I found on it seemed to be made cheaply. This one is very durable easy to use and it handles well. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Vonda R. Brix

customer_reviews.title: A great tool and does the job with ease
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about the quality, but be relieved it’s worth the money. Does the job with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Steele

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I'm making more things from scratch, it is nice to have a great quality, b two in one tool that doesn't take up a lot of room in my kitchen. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Giacomelli

customer_reviews.title: Made raviolis
customer_reviews.text: I made raviolis. It was the first time. Its a pretty slick little tool.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Helpful.  A Must Have.
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product! So glad we bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Brown Eyed Girl

customer_reviews.title: Well made, works great.
customer_reviews.text: Made a lot of beautiful, colored, pasta for Christmas gifts and the fluted edges from this cutter make pasta even prettier.
customer_reviews.author: Betty B

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I've started making lattice crust pies. Easy to use, and the perfect size. This is much more convenient than a knife.
customer_reviews.author: L Kay

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice little product, decent quality... will have to see if it stands the test of time
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy cutter
customer_reviews.text: Works just as advertised. No undue wobble and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: SLjavajunkie

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: It does the job well and cleans well. so far it stays in the drawer right where I want it to be -- and the price was persuasive. A great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made.  Cheap quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly made at a basic level. See photo, the stamp is offset making one side of the wheel with and extra lip not capable of cutting while the other side is “sharpish.” Cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: You couldn't get a better pasta cutter!
customer_reviews.text: This utensil is so easy to use. It is just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen McMahon-paulus

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my daughter along with a pasta machine. Her first attempt was a resounding success. She was delighted with how well this wheel tool worked to cut her lasagna.
customer_reviews.author: BamaMama

customer_reviews.title: Rolls and cuts well
customer_reviews.text: what can I say - it rolls well and cuts pasta dough easily so is the perfect ravioli wheel. I have had zero problems with it and would buy it again. It's easy to hold and cleans well in a dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Karyl. Lena's Human

customer_reviews.title: Useless defective item, and useless Amazon exchange policy
customer_reviews.text: The pastry wheel (the curvy blade) came off after a few short washings, in about 45 days. I’m left with just the straight edge wheel, but I could just use a plain knife, or my pizza wheel, and not have bought this. So it is useless now. I can't return it or exchange it because it was an add-on item.
customer_reviews.author: lovestocook

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Simple tool, not much to say. Makes cutting pasta a lot quicker. Great addition to my kitchen gear.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for cutting up pancakes and quesadillas for my kids
customer_reviews.author: jjrrks

customer_reviews.title: Made neat cuts w/out sticking to the dough. Sometimes ...
customer_reviews.text: Made neat cuts w/out sticking to the dough. Sometimes the wheel will stop rolling for a second and slide, but this could be fixed by simply stopping, rolling backward, and starting again
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never used this to make ravioli but it’s small and easy to use to cut my kid’s food into bite-sized pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Veleke

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great cutting ravioli. Glad I got it, definitely needed the finishing touch.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Payne

customer_reviews.title: Handy Tool
customer_reviews.text: Provides a professional finishing touch to many baking applications. Design is versatile and only your imagination restricts your usage. Provides a professional touch.
customer_reviews.author: Harold D. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice grip. Well made and smooth and sturdy during cutting. Dishwasher cleaned it up with no issues. I'm very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: L Parr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made it so much easier if the mold didn't cut it.
customer_reviews.author: martha klischer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and works great
customer_reviews.text: works great. easy to use. arrived very fast.. no need for forms or other gadgets to make ravioli
customer_reviews.author: Carol L

customer_reviews.title: Cool Tool
customer_reviews.text: Good item, works as expected and will use it often.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Spoonts

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, I use it when making many dough ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tool, I use it when making many dough products not just pasta, great for sam'bu'sak, Triming Bur'ra'kah. Perogi, etc. love it.,
customer_reviews.author: Steven B Dulin

customer_reviews.title: Nice cutter.
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is supposed to do, and so far no problems. Great replacement for my old single blade cutter..
customer_reviews.author: Mark Licenzi

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp
customer_reviews.text: Made a batch of rugelach and this made cutting the triangles a breeze. You gave to put the filling on the dough before you cut. Worked great on thinner fillings but finely chopped nuts got stuck on it and affected the smooth handling. Had to keep a bowl of water and paper towels handy. Great for plain dough or dough with thin toppings. OK for other applications.
customer_reviews.author: Chrispy11

customer_reviews.title: Wheely
customer_reviews.text: Works well, think a little skill from the person using it; is required
customer_reviews.author: Nat Fralia

customer_reviews.title: Norpro Pastry and Ravioli Wheel
customer_reviews.text: This is such a smart idea to combine 2 tools into much smaller space ! The crinkly wheel makes great square cookies as well as is handy for ravioli. And the smooth wheel makes a GREAT PIZZA CUTTER.
customer_reviews.author: J. Vanek

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The blades are sharp and the easy grip handle is comfortable. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: K. R.

customer_reviews.title: easy pastry cutter
customer_reviews.text: This worked better than I expected. So much easier than using a knife. Zipped right through cutting out of 10 dozen cookies.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. Handle is perfect. Better built than we would have expected. We use it often and just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryewst

customer_reviews.title: As it should
customer_reviews.text: Works well, arrived nice and sharp. You'd think all new knifes and cutters would, but they do not. We are using this to cut out rolled cookie dough to give it the nice fluted edge.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaR

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: No complaints with this product. I like that it has two different cutting heads on it so you can have a ravioli end or just a straight edge. Pretty standard, and I've used it a couple of times.
customer_reviews.author: lmad5989

customer_reviews.title: Pastry wheel
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, great for artisinal pasta. Haven't used it for pastry yet, but imagine it will work well as the flat wheel is thin and sharp
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Blinn

customer_reviews.title: Gave this to my son-in-law as a gift
customer_reviews.text: He loves it. Works as described and he has already used it to make us some great pasta. I would recommend this pasta wheel.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for lasagne noodles and ravioli
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the crinkle end to make gluten free lasagne noodles and ravioli and it worked great! Arrived quickly and is sturdy, as are most Norpro products.
customer_reviews.author: Raskolnikov

customer_reviews.title: Good litte tool!
customer_reviews.text: Just started making our own pasta at home! This tool has come in quite handy when cutting the pasta into squares.

customer_reviews.title: i recommend this tool to anyone making ravioli
customer_reviews.text: It is easy-to-use and cuts very nicely. I am so excited now to be making our own ravioli! Wow i am so impressed how it comes out so nice!
customer_reviews.author: jazzyteach

customer_reviews.title: Pasta/Pastry Cutter
customer_reviews.text: Dual cutting wheels and the easy grip handle make this a great pasta/pastry cutter. The handle is comfortable. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well!
customer_reviews.text: Great little item and works great! I just would like the handle to be a little bigger.

customer_reviews.title: Get's the work done!
customer_reviews.text: Well built, good materials, light and gets the job done. I used it to cut ravioli, pizza and other similar things.
customer_reviews.author: MAF 123

customer_reviews.title: does not seal
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would seal my homemade ravioli but did not work well. I use it with the Fantes Grandpa Dante's ravioli Form for cutting after taking out of the form. The form does not cut well. Works great for that. and cutting dough for noodles or pie dough
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: good quality pastry wheel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pastry wheel to cut out fondant. The handle has a comfortable grip and the wheels are sturdy and steady.

customer_reviews.text: live this little gadget. makes cutting raviloils super easy. can double as a cookie cutter as well. very happy and satisfied!

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Very helpful to have when making pasta. Easier to use than a regular knife or a pastry knife.

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for a variety of cooking and baking applications.

customer_reviews.title: ... use it yet but I know it will be fine for
customer_reviews.text: I haven't use it yet but I know it will be fine for me

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: many uses, including cutting home made crackers, and small pizzas
customer_reviews.author: minpinmom

customer_reviews.title: Have not yet used this!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in part to get over a dollar amount to get free shipping on another item, and have not had need to use it. It seems like a nice little wheel, though, and as I get more heavily involved with pasta making, I can see where it will come in handy and be the appropriate tool for the job.
customer_reviews.author: ijoyl

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Not so bad...might get 1 more. 14 more words required! 10 more 8 7 6 5 4 3 2 1 finish

customer_reviews.title: grip - EZ pastery and Ravioli Wheel
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what i was looking for and I've tried others at different stores and were not as sturdy as this one
customer_reviews.author: Denise wilson

customer_reviews.title: ravioli/pastry crimper
customer_reviews.text: This grip-ez product is high quality and dishwasher safe! It does exactly what it is suppose to do for at a reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nardi

customer_reviews.title: OK product
customer_reviews.text: This wheel does its job. It rolls and cuts the pasta. The handle is great, but the actual wheel is a bit shaky, it doesn't feel rugged at all, and it slightly tilts sideways while rolling. Also, the wheel could be a bit sharper.
customer_reviews.author: Leo JM

customer_reviews.title: ravioli wheel
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet but I can see that it will do the job that I purchased it for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it’s a pasta cutter
customer_reviews.text: It’s a pasta cutter. It works well to cut pasta. It is not Bluetooth equipped nor is it remotely controlled. Basically, you roll out your pasta, cut it with this device, eat the pasta, and put the cutter in the dishwasher and back into the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Haven't made pasta since receiving, but this gadget is really well made and the blades are very sharp - no question it will work great next time my daughters visit and want to make pasta. I'd recommend just on appearance and build.
customer_reviews.author: acesfan

customer_reviews.title: Multiple uses
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for making lattice for pie crusts but it also works for slicing thin crust pizzas. The grip is very sturdy and cleans up easily and is dishwasher safe. An inexpensive, practical wedding shower gift. A must for pie making..
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wallig

customer_reviews.title: makes making Bow Ties pasta a breeze
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good tool for making different pastas like bow ties or even ravioli. And makes great lattice stripes for apple and cherry pies. Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: low quality
customer_reviews.text: the wheels are shaky (tilt to the sides) making it hard to cut a straight line. the curved cutter is not curved enough... the result is too subtle. i would invest more money and get a better cutter than this one
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Fine for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product, I would have given it more stars, but if you put too much pressure on it, it sticks, and you have to watch out for dough sticking in it very often. But it does the job for the low amount you pay. Just be careful the amount of pressure you use.
customer_reviews.author: Penney G. Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Handy little gadget
customer_reviews.text: Bought this along with a book on making Artisan pasta. It is a handy little tool, but does have a little bit of a learning curve and if you want straight cuts, you need either a measuring mat underneath or a very steady hand. Has held up well through the dishwasher although I would recommend hand washing if you use the grooved side just to make sure no little particles get left behind.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: Clearly cheap and breaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: This item showed up broken. One of the wheels broke off and isn't even in the box. Therefore the item was clearly broken before it was even placed in the box.
customer_reviews.author: A-Aron

customer_reviews.title: It's what my sister and her fiancé wanted for their wedding gifts.
customer_reviews.text: It's what my sister and her fiancé wanted for their wedding gifts. I would assume it's nice since they are particular about this kind of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality, defective wheel
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item in anticipation of making Christmas Springerle cookies. I especially wanted the fluted wheel so that the cookies would have a professional, finished look to them. Unfortunately, I didn't use the wheel until December, at which time I realized the fluted wheel does not turn, making it very difficult to achieve the fluted edge to my cookies, and the return period had already expired. Lesson learned: open and try out everything as soon as it arrives to make sure it works! Never would have thought that a simple little item like this would arrive defective! Next time I'll just go to Bed Bath & Beyond for my kitchen utensils.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for....well made and sturdy....I'm very pleased !!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Rolly
customer_reviews.text: Norpro is always quality and always functional. I use this all the time cutting and sealing dough products.
customer_reviews.author: Matt fleisher

customer_reviews.title: Was apprehensive but it is great
customer_reviews.text: I was worried, after reading other reviews, that this pastry cutter would be cheap and flimsy. 6 pies later and ot is still going strong:)
customer_reviews.author: Katy Cairnie

customer_reviews.title: Nice gadget to have
customer_reviews.text: Handle is comfortable, easy to control. I like there are 2 blades on this wheel, I use the wavy one to help fix my ravioli when the press doesn’t quite do the job.
customer_reviews.author: KeeneMama

customer_reviews.title: Good product, not so good seller
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the product because it was missing one of the cutter. I returned the defective product and received one good. It was frustrating because we had plans for the weekend (make raviolis) and I cant understand that when the first one was shipped the seller did not notice it was defective.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Eduardo Soto

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! I am very happy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I am very happy with the product. Highly recommedned!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect, just like the one I was using in Italy!

customer_reviews.title: Ok product for money
customer_reviews.text: Ok product, little hard to clean cause of close quarters of 2 cutters

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: My son in law used it with the pasta roller attachment and made delicious ravioli.
customer_reviews.author: D'Anne lutz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's great for cutting lattice tops on pies and raviolis... Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Duplisea

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to make somepastry and pasta with this.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: So definitely worth the couple of bucks it costs!
customer_reviews.text: This pastry wheel works super well, and it's small and easy to store in my already crowded drawers! We got this to use with both Ravioli and with puff pastry and other things that we use in the kitchen and so far it hasn't let us down!
customer_reviews.author: KatTop Contributor: Watercolor Painting

customer_reviews.title: Thanks for a great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my sister and she was so excited. Using it for ravioli and other pasta. Thanks for a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: L J.

customer_reviews.title: The pizza cutter side works perfectly fine. However
customer_reviews.text: I have used this a few times. The pizza cutter side works perfectly fine. However, when using the riveted side I had to stop my cutting of pie crust every few spins and adjust it & start again. The blade must be getting stuck somewhere on the hinge.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Girkin

product_meta.title: Norpro Grip-EZ Pastry/Ravioli Wheel
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1Norpro Grip-Ez Pastry / Ravioli WheelThis tool will allow making ravioli quick and easy. The handle comes with a non slip grip.Model #: 112 Material: Plastic handle Color: Black handle Comfortable grip Dishwasher safe Stainless steel blade Length: 7" Shipping weight: .5 lb 112565
feature_bullets: Pastry wheel, sometimes called pastry cutter, makes cutting shapes fast and easy. Making homemade ravioli will be a snap with the ravioli cutter wheel.

Double-headed fluted wheel for scalloped edge and straight cut with flat wheel. Ideal for pasta, pastry or cookie dough, create beautiful lattice crusts and decorative cuts for pies, pastries and ravioli.
Soft  santoprene handle provides a comfortable non-slip grip, ideal for left or right hand use.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,150 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
